question: How many hours of daylight does Uppsala, Sweden receive during the summer solstice?
asked_question_translated: Hur många timmar dagsljus får Uppsala, Sverige under sommarsolståndet?
answer: Under sommarsolståndet får Uppsala, Sverige ungefär 18-19 timmar dagsljus.
answer_translated_eng: During the summer solstice, Uppsala, Sweden gets about 18-19 hours of daylight.
